title: Google promotes Ukraine relief efforts in Search and Gmail, will match donations up to $5 million
content:
Google.org is kicking off a new initiative to help those affected by Russia’s attack on Ukraine. Through the end of April, Google will match donations to Ukraine relief efforts.

more…

The post Google promotes Ukraine relief efforts in Search and Gmail, will match donations up to $5 million appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is matching and promoting donations to relief efforts for those affected by the war in Ukraine through a new program.
